abstract: G.E. plans to participate in the country’s “massive focus” on energy and will create a fund for infrastructure that could reach $1 billion.
snippet: G.E. plans to participate in the country’s “massive focus” on energy and will create a fund for infrastructure that could reach $1 billion.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, May 31 — Pressure to slim General Electric’s corporate portfolio at home has not stopped Jeffrey R. Immelt’s aggressive plans for expanding in emerging markets.

headline.main: Chief Says G.E. Aims to Match the Growth Pace Set by India
headline.print_headline: Chief Says G.E. Aims to Match The Growth Pace Set by India

abstract: Lorene F. Schaefer has accused G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.
snippet: Lorene F. Schaefer has accused G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.
lead_paragraph: Lorene F. Schaefer says she moved steadily up General Electric’s in-house legal ladder for 13 years, getting praise and stock grants each step along the way. She made it as far as general counsel for GE Transportation.

headline.main: Lawyer Files Bias Suit Against G.E.
headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Accuses G.E. of Bias Against Women

abstract: A lawyer for General Electric, Lorene F. Schaefer, has filed a lawsuit in Federal District Court in Connecticut, accusing G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for General Electric, Lorene F. Schaefer, has filed a lawsuit in Federal District Court in Connecticut, accusing G.E. of systematically discriminating against women in both pay and promotions.

headline.main: Lawyer Files Bias Suit Against G.E
